name: 15 Gal Electric Oil Drain Pan, 110V High-Flow Pump, 9.8 FT Hose, 200 W Motor, 2 Locking Swivel Casters and 2 Directional Wheels Stable, Folding Handle, Heavy-Duty for Trucks, RVs, SUVs, Yellow
short_description: High Capacity：Oversized 31.5" x 19.7" x 5.7"Steel tank delivers a verified 15 gallons and provides a bigger footprint than standard oil drain pans so shop owners, fleet managers, farmers and DIYers can drain a full-size pickup, two RVs or four sedans in one go with less lifting, fewer trips to the recycler and more time for paid jobs. It works with all common waste oils (motor, hydraulic, etc.)—gasoline explicitly excluded.

Optimized Copper Motor：The copper motor features a 110V power supply and 200W maximum output, tipping the scales at 610.5g to stand heavier and more robust than standard motors in oil pans. This added heft translates to stronger performance: It delivers powerful flow rates of 26L/min for diesel and 18L/min for engine oil, draining oil to help finish jobs in less time. For busy shops, and weekend DIYers alike, this means boosted efficiency, reduced labor time, and smoother workflow—whether tackling back-to-back oil changes with oil pans or squeezing in a project at home. It is engineered to make every task quicker, easier, and more reliable.

Heavy-Duty Construction：The electric oil change pan has 1.5 mm carbon-steel walls and is 0.5 mm thicker than standard oil change pans, so it resists daily wear, handles heavy hydraulic loads without warping, and stands up to rough movement in busy shops. It features a precision powder-coat finish that fights corrosion, stays rust-free, and keeps the surface looking sharp. Finely welded seams boost load capacity and eliminate leak risks, and each unit is water-tested before shipment to ensure it is a long-lasting, leak-proof tool for shops, fleets, and DIYers.

User-Friendly Design：The 28.9× 16.9" filter screen with smaller holes on oil drain pans minimizes splatters and catches dropped parts, keeping floors clean and saving time. Its 1.2 mm metal frame resists warping, ensuring durability for oil drain pans. The T-handle folds from 40–180°, collapses flat for storage, and reaches easily under vehicles—perfect for maneuvering oil drain pans. Two fixed 4-inch wheels and two 3-inch swivel wheels with brakes ensure stable, secure positioning for oil drain pans—even on slopes. Together, these elements make every oil change with oil drain pans quicker, neater, and hassle-free.

Durable Hose：The 9.8 FT oil drain hose is made with high-temperature-resistant steel wire and a metal straight pipe, giving longer reach than standard hoses for flexible, easy operation with oil pump. This design stays durable and leak-proof, letting you drain oil from a distance with oil pump without hassle. It pairs with a filter-equipped connecting hose that traps impurities during oil extraction for oil pump. This prevents debris from entering the motor, reduces oil pump issues, and extends the oil pump’s lifespan—meaning fewer mid-job interruptions and lower long-term costs. These hoses offer reach, durability, and protection for smoother, more reliable oil changes with oil pump.

name: Spill-Less DrainMate™ 14 Quart Oil Drain Container/Oil Drain Pan, Sealed Lid for Easy Transport, On-Off Spigot for Precise Fluid Transfer, Made in USA
short_description: Extra Wide Opening – Unlike an oil drain pan, the large 12" wide x 11" deep opening reduces oil draining splatter and makes it easier to maneuver without spilling.

Leak Proof Container – All seals are custom made from automotive grade Nitrile Butadiene Rubber for petroleum resistance. The spigot assembly has redundant gaskets ensure a leak-proof seal with long lasting durability.
Precision Flow Spigot – Large spout allows for controlled pouring directly into a recycling container or back into the oil’s original container or storage tank, no funnel is required.
No Cleanup Needed – Skip wiping down an oil change pan and funnel after each use and say goodbye to fluid transfer spills that occur with other oil pans for changing oil.
Sealed Lid – Removable screw-down lid with NBR gasket locks in oil when transporting and keeps odors out of your garage during storage.
Generous Large Capacity – The 3.5gal container holds up to 14 quarts (13.2L)
Heavy Duty Metal Handle – Makes transport easy and carry up to 26lbs of oil without strain.
Hassle Free Recycling – Easily pour used oil back into its original container for quick, convenient, and eco-friendly disposal at any auto parts store.
Built Tough in the USA – Designed for years of use. Made from industrial-grade 90mil HDPE plastic which is 29% thicker than commonly made buckets for unmatched durability and long-term reliability.
Lifetime Warranty – Built to last and backed for life, every component of the Spill-Less DrainMate is guaranteed to last.
product_description: The Spill-Less DrainMate oil drain container, fluid transfer or fluid transport container is the ultimate no-mess solution for draining, storing, transferring, and recycling used oil. Take the hassle out of oil changes with an all-in-one solution for clean, efficient oil drainage and transport. Whether you're a weekend DIYer or a seasoned mechanic the Spill-Less DrainMate is designed to make your oil changes faster, cleaner, and easier than ever.
